title: Vegetarian empanadas with tomato, basil and mozzarella
ingredients: ['3 medium tomatoes, seeded and cubed', '1 bunch fresh basil leaves, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '250g mozzarella cheese, cubed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '12 empanada pastry discs', '1 tablespoon mustard of your choice', '1 tablespoon sesame seeds']
